actions.text: QUESTION OF THE PRIVILEGES OF THE HOUSE - Mr. Walker rose to a question of the privileges of the House and submitted H. Res. 526 for immediate consideration. The Chair ruled that the resolution constituted a question of the privileges of the House and qualified for consideration.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate.
Mr. Kleczka moved to table the measure.
On motion to table the measure Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 223 - 196 (Roll no. 307).
Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

official_title: Relating to the privileges of the House.

summary.text: Directs the Committee on House Administration to make public complete transcripts of all proceedings of the Task Force to Investigate the Operation and Management of the House Post Office, including depositions and statements of witnesses.

titles.title: Relating to the privileges of the House.
